name: pickledb
content: ["{\"type\":\"markdown\",\"value\":\"pickledb_key1\\npickledb_key2\\n\\n\\npickledb_key3[pickledb_key4](https://pythonhosted.org/pickleDB/)\\npickledb_key5\\n\\n```bash\\n>>> import pickledb\\n\\n>>> db = pickledb.load('example.db', False)\\n\\n>>> db.set('key', 'value')\\nTrue\\n\\n>>> db.get('key')\\n'value'\\n\\n>>> db.dump()\\nTrue\\n```\\npickledb_key6\\n\\n\\n```bash\\n# For Python 2.7\\nsudo apt install python-pip\\npip install pickledb\\n\\n# For Python 3.0+\\nsudo apt install python3-pip\\npip3 install pickledb\\n```\\npickledb_key7\\n\"}"]
